value.title: Quick guide to create new Dataflows in Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you confused by the four options available on the create Power BI dataflows welcome screen? In this video I will go through each of them and give you at the end the business user guide to it. value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.
